txt.en: 'Do you think you have a good, strong arm? Do you have warm mittens? Do you think you can throw snowballs at others faster than they can throw snowballs at you? If you've answered yes to all of these questions, you should certainly head north of town and visit the Snowball Field! You'll have to do some ducking and tossing during each round, but I'm sure you're up to the challenge!'
How do I join the Snowball-fight?
